did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: William W. Hansen lecture notebooks (Notes on lectures given at Massachusetts Institute of Technology)

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: Gift of Elliott Levinthal, Stanford professor emeritus of mechanical engineering, via Perry Wilson and Robin Chandler, December 1991.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [identification of item], William W. Hansen lecture notebooks (SC1140). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: William Webster Hansen Papers (SC0004); William Webster Hansen Papers, (SC0126).

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: William Webster Hansen was Professor of Physics and Director of the Microwave Laboratory at Stanford University, 1929-1949.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These notes are based upon the special series of lectures delivered to the members of Radiation Laboratory by Dr. W.W. Hansen.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.corpname: Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Radiation Laboratory.
controlaccess.subject: Microwaves.
